title: Sieler fÃ¼r einen Club/Community/Gruppe gesucht! (Englisch/Deutsch)
body:
Hi everyone, i see many of you are looking here for some "groups or friends" to play with..
2 days ago I made an IG Club and Discord Server with active and kind people who are playing daily together, we are already on 25 Members. Its always better to have 5 premades online then to get some "randoms" who will flame or tilt you matchuped. Ikr
I would also like to create some intern **tournaments** and stuff like that.
Everyone who can behave himself is welcome, so as you and all your friends are!
Are you unranked, bronze, silver, gold or Diamond it doesnt matter, all are welcome as long as u can have fun playing and feel urself comfortable with the people around you. 
Most Members speak **English** or **German**, but if your not that good at one of those its not a problem.
**I dont have any special sing up requirements**, you dont have to use daily discord or speak 24/7 with each other, or do anything for me/us, all i want from you is to be **kind** to each other and not to fight or provocate somebody!
If you are interested in joining us, feel free to add me in the game for more infos:

* _In-Game name: **Wondux**_

P.S Es ist auf Englisch weil ich es erst mal auf EN Foren gepostet habe, sryy!

Best regards.

Spieler immer noch gesucht!
